title: Dark Seal Tryndamere

embed.description: Hey guys Youmuus here today we are finally doing it. We are playing the build that got us banned but this time i actually perfected it ! Watch the power of dark seal proxy Tryndamere early game as we start the game with 3 dark seals and solo carry a losing game.

body: A pretty big Youtouber called "Youmuus" made a video about a proxyfarm Tryndamere build where He goes dark Seal first item for the lane sustain but I thought dark Seal only increased healing from potions.  Is dark Seal effecting Tryndamere q?

replies.body: AP increase the heal of his q, and dark seal give AP
